name: AEONS x Shawn Vales - Waves
description:
1/1 NFT of 2021's 'Waves' - original music by Isaac Puglia aka @aeonsmusic and Cover Art (oil on canvas) by Shawn Vales aka @shawnvales

Ownership of this NFT grants rights to 20% of all future (trackable and automated) profits from this song, as well as the right to create and profit from derivatives. 20% of all (trackable and automated if you wish) profits from derivatives are kindly requested by the creators. Ownership also grants VIP access to all future AEONS live events, as well as special social media access (eg DM replies, Discord Roles/Channels, etc). DM @aeonsmusic with questions.
